channel.description: 1 part mix to 8 parts distilled water Ingredients Manual pot and pan dawn JLube Baking powder 2 cups tap water 2 cups dawn 7 grams baking powder Mix in 4 grams J Lube - mix well so it doesn’t clump up Can use a fork or even better a drill paint mixer Let mix sit over night and shake it occasionally It’s okay if you end up with white powder on the bottom
